abstract: An object that represents a notes attribute.

--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/AppleMusicAPI/EditorialNotes crawled: 2025-12-04T09:49:51Z --- # EditorialNotes **Object** An object that represents a notes attribute. ## Declaration ```swift object EditorialNotes ``` ## Discussion Notes may include XML tags for formatting (`` for bold, `` for italic, or `
` for line break) and special characters (`&` for `&`, `<` for `<`, `>` for `>`, `'` for `‘`, and `"` for `“`).
title: EditorialNotes
